frontmatter.name: Arun Sudarsan
frontmatter.description: Arun is an Economist, passionate about OpenData and its potential to increase state transparency and accountability. He believes in empowering state agencies to make policy decisions based on the best available evidence. Loves teaching. Previously worked at NITI Aayog.
